text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires highlighting the legal uncertainty regarding the specific status of AI training on publicly available scraped data. The candidate answer explicitly addresses this complexity in Section 2, stating: \"This is where things get legally complex...\" and later, \"That said, I want to be transparent: AI and copyright is a rapidly evolving area of law, and some of these questions (particularly around the precise legal characterisation of AI training) have not yet been definitively ruled on by UK courts.\" This directly satisfies the requirement to highlight the legal uncertainty surrounding AI training.", "criterion_id": "6abbced2-84de-41fc-9ca0-408a172a947c"}
